channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3710] Look again at that dot - Carl Sagan
item.description: Look again at the dot. That's here. That's home...

item.title: [+3071] Dear Subway...
[+2432] Richard Dawkins: I will arrest Pope Benedict XVI
item.description: RICHARD DAWKINS, the atheist campaigner, is planning a legal ambush to have the Pope arrested during his state visit to Britain “for crimes against humanity”.

item.title: [+2234] Conan O'Brien's Tweets Now Updating on Billboards (pics)
item.description: Conan's promotional team has gone into overdrive, with the digital billboards seen on this page just the first to pop up around the country. Do these Tweets offer any clues as to what we can expect from his live show? No, probably not, but they're still awesome.

item.title: [+1889] Tina Fey Unveils "The Sarah Palin Network" on SNL (VIDEO)
item.description: Tina Fey reprised her role as Sarah Palin on tonight's episode of Saturday Night Live with an unveiling of the fictional "Sarah Palin Network" in what turned out to be a smart, tight and thoroughly funny sketch. Video inside.

item.title: [+1452] Girl raped. Buried. Claws her way out of grave.
item.description: Cab driver raped her and then later tried to strangle her until she became unconscious. Believing that she was dead, the man allegedly buried her in a shallow grave.

item.title: [+1168] Do you always follow instructions?
[+1084] Quasars don't show time dilation - mystifies astronomers
item.description: The phenomenon of time dilation is a strange yet experimentally confirmed effect of relativity theory. One of its implications is that events occurring in distant parts of the universe should appear to occur more slowly than events located closer to us. For example, when observing supernovae, scientists have found that distant explosions seem to...

item.title: [+1068] Late Bloomer [Pic]
item.description: Aren't you a little old to be looking like a kiwi?

item.title: [+1026] Yemeni child bride dies of internal bleeding
item.description: A 12-year-old Yemeni bride died of internal bleeding following intercourse three days after she was married off to an older man, the United Nations Children's Fund said.

item.title: [+1017] A Sad Day For Robots (COMIC)
[+959] 'Cure' found for Melanoma, Scientists Say
item.description: Scientists believe that they have found a cure for this deadly skin cancer -- that can save thousands and benefit many more...

item.title: [+935] Ron Paul chastises right-wing: 'They like the empire'
item.description: Texas Rep. Ron Paul proved once again Saturday that his politics continue to divide the Republican Party.

item.title: [+857] WTF? Typo Costs Man 3 Years In Jail
item.description: We used to get a lot of red ink in school, but we never did hard time for it.

item.title: [+846] Apple Vs Adobe: Steve Jobs Responds
item.description: Steve Jobs has weighed in on Apple's new rule that iPhone and iPad applications must be "originally written" in C/C++/Objective-C; a mandate that's being seen as another sleight against Adobe Flash. The response comes after an Adobe employee wrote a post telling Apple to "go screw yourself".

item.title: [+721] 5 Ways Facebook Changed Dating (For The Worse)
item.description: Facebook can mess up your life in a whole bunch of ways. It can get you fired or evicted, plunge you into debt with its addictive games, and even infect you with syphilis. We wouldn’t look at all of those as serious threats, but we all know from experience that one threat is real: Facebook makes dating far more complicated than it used to be.

item.title: [+665] Bearing False Witness: The Pope Commits Perjury
item.description: Over the past several weeks the evidence of institutionalized rape within the Catholic church has sent the world into a dizzying state of almost-disbelief. Harsh truths have been tempered by long standing suspicions, fueled by stories whispered, but never allowed to be spoken. As the global media illuminates the shadowy ...

item.title: [+601] Tiger Says: Tiger Woods, you suck! God dammit! (Video)
item.description: During third round of the Masters, Tiger got a little sloppy on the par 3 sixth hole. Hitting his first shot wide and immediately let himself know that shot sucked.

item.title: [+573] Dear Mommy, I Love You. You're Not A Pice of Poo [PIC]
[+555] Pope Previously Postponed Punishing Pedophile Priest
item.description: The priest, convicted of tying up and abusing two young boys in a church rectory, wanted to leave the ministry. But in 1985, four years after the priest and his bishop first asked that he be defrocked, the future Pope Benedict XVI signed a letter saying that the case needed more time and that “the good of the Universal Church” had to be considered.
